channel.title: J-RISE NEWS
channel.description: J-RISE Initiative公式のニュースフィード

item.title: The universities selected for “EXPERT-J” (“EXcellence Program for Engaging Research Talent – Japan”) have been finalized.
Minister of State for Science and Technology Policy, KIUCHI Minoru, visited Tohoku University and exchanged opinions with researchers.
Minister of State for Science and Technology Policy, KIUCHI Minoru, visited RIKEN and exchanged opinions with researchers.
